name: Professor Dr. Fatema Ashraf
about: MBBS, FCPS (Obstetrics & Gynecology) MPH (Epidemiology) Visiting Professor, Dept. of Obstetrics & Gynecology, Combined Military Hospital, Dhaka. Former Head, Department of Obstetrics & Gynecology Shaheed Suhrawardy Medical College Hospital, Dhaka.
